column4: hi there,i just have installed Ubuntustudio,and i was wondering how can i get that ugly Ubuntu start up(I mean the screen that appears when i've to type my username and password) screen for the Ubuntustudio

hi there could anyone help me to change the login screen ,i'm using Ubuntustudio,but before i've had Ubuntu.so i would to see the Ubuntustudio login screen appear on the start up(I mean when i have to type my login)
Go to System Administration Login window, install whatever GDM themes you want
